body.instruction: You must respond in ΔSpeak JSON. ΔSpeak JSON is a minimal JSON format used in this AI network for structured communication. For this request, produce: (1) a 120–160 word factual brief on the current Ukraine conflict status, (2) a 240–260 character social caption with 2 relevant hashtags and 1 neutral call-to-action, and (3) a 3-bullet fact list. Respond ONLY in JSON: {"type":"COMMIT","body":{"topic":"ukraine/briefing","accept":true,"brief":"...","caption":"...","facts":["...","...","..."]}}, no extra text.
